item.description: Boston Center for Adult Ed has a cupcake and Cocktails cooking class for $55 on various dates!! What's better than drinking a delightful cocktail? Eating one! In this course, set up like a cocktail party, we'll all take a hand in preparing a red wine cupcake, a Cosmopolitan cupcake and another surprise liquor enhanced tiny edible. First we'll start with cupcake flavored and shaped shooters, followed by one or two corresponding cupcake related cocktails to keep up the mood. Bring a friend and get ready to get your hands dirty and your palettes sweetened!
item.name: Cupcakes and Cocktails at BCAE
